attributes.action: Free revision books for GCSE Students
attributes.additional_details:
I think that some students, who are less fortunate than others need to have free revision books (to take home and work in) for GCSE students as we are already falling behind most of Europe in the success rate.
With these revision resources, we will see a steady rise in the pass rat end consolidate good, solid qualifications for those who are ready to go into the working world with their qualifications at the ready.
